pages.title: Freezing Conditions
pages.text: In $(b)Snowy$() and $(b)Icy$() biomes, hunger becomes critical.$(br2)If your hunger drops below $(c)half$(), the cold will begin to damage you.$(br2)Eat well before traveling through frozen lands.

pages.title: The Nether
pages.text: The Nether is brutally exhausting.$(br2)Passive exhaustion increases dramatically in this dimension.$(br)Food consumption is significantly higher.$(br2)Prepare accordingly before extended expeditions.
